title: [Tuts Plus] Getting Started With Laravel 4 Video Tutorial-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Getting Started With Laravel 4 Video Tutorial-KTR
=============================================================



PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Joost Van Veen
RELEASE DATE..: 2014.09.04
RUNTIME......: 2.7 hours



About this course::

It is no exaggeration to say that Laravel has taken the PHP community by storm. If you're ready to start learning Laravel, this course will cover all the basics to get you ready to go. Topics covered include routing, controllers, models, views, the blade templating engine, eloquent, authentication, resources, validation and then some. To complete this course, you'll build a hands-on project that'll put all the skills you've learned into practice.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Welcome


2.Getting to Know Laravel
2.1Installing Composer and a Command Line Tool
2.2Creating a Laravel 4 Project
2.3Laravel 4 MVC
2.4Laravel 4 Routing
2.5Laravel 4 Route Groups And Filters
2.6Resource Controllers
2.7Blade Essentials
2.8Blade Layouts And Partials


3.Working With the Database
3.1Laravel 4 Migrations
3.2Laravel 4 Query Builder
3.3Eloquent CRUD
3.4Eloquent Relations
3.5Laravel 4 Database Seeding


4.Forms and Validation
4.1Setting Up a Laravel Form
4.2Validating the Form


5.Hands-On Project: A Simple Blog
5.1Setting Up the Blog
5.2Creating the Admin Post Resource
5.3Securing the Admin Panel
5.4Creating the Front-End


6.Conclusion
6.1Conclusion and Resources
